landing.title: ProperTea
landing.description: Streamline your property management operations with our comprehensive platform. Manage properties, track maintenance, and keep your tenants happy.

properties.title: Property Management
properties.description: Centralize all property information, documents, and history in one place.

tenants.title: Tenant Management
tenants.description: Track tenant information, leases, and communication seamlessly.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Tracking

password.minlength: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.symbol: Password must contain at least one special character

error.generic: Failed to register organization. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to ProperTea! Manage your properties efficiently.

docs.title: Getting Started with ProperTea
docs.subtitle: Learn how to manage your properties effectively with our comprehensive platform.

step1.title: Register Your Organization
step1.description: Create your organization account to start managing your properties.

step2.title: Add Your Properties
step2.description: Define your property portfolio with detailed information about each unit.

step3.title: Manage Tenants
step3.description: Track tenant information, leases, and communication in one place.

step4.title: Track Maintenance
step4.description: Handle maintenance requests and keep your properties in top condition.

feature1.title: Property Management
feature1.description: Centralize all property information, documents, and history.

feature2.title: Tenant Portal
feature2.description: Give tenants access to pay rent, submit requests, and view documents.

feature3.title: Maintenance Tracking
feature3.description: Streamline maintenance requests from submission to completion.

feature4.title: Reports & Analytics
feature4.description: Gain insights into your portfolio performance and financials.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join property managers who trust ProperTea to streamline their operations. Register your organization today and start managing your properties more efficiently.

errors.ORG.NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: An organization with the name '{{organizationName}}' already exists
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.NAME_TOO_SHORT: Organization name must be at least 2 characters
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.FIRST_NAME_TOO_SHORT: First name must be at least 1 character
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.LAST_NAME_TOO_SHORT: Last name must be at least 1 character
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MISSING_LOWERCAS: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MISSING_UPPERCAS: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MISSING_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
errors.ORG.VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MISSING_SPECIAL: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.VALIDATION.ERROR: Validation failed. Please check your input.
errors.COMMON.UNEXPECTED: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
